å°†"Hello World"è¿™ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²èµ‹å€¼ç»™__å˜é‡a__ï¼Œé€šè¿‡print()å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå°†å˜é‡açš„å†…å®¹æ‰“å°å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œaå°±æ˜¯"Hello World"ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€ç»ˆæ‰“å°å†…å®¹å°±æ˜¯Hello Worldã€‚

2.2 å­—ç¬¦ä¸²String

å†™è½¯ä»¶ä¼šç»å¸¸ç”¨åˆ°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ‹¼æ¥åœºæ™¯ï¼Œå½“æœ‰å˜é‡å’Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ··ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¸€å †+æœ‰äº›ä¹±ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥Pythonæœ‰ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ‹¼æ¥çš„å¤§æ€å™¨ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯få­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆf æ˜¯ formatã€è®¾ç½®æ ¼å¼ã€‘çš„ç®€å†™ ï¼‰ã€‚å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š

èŠ±æ‹¬å·{}é‡Œå¸¦ç€å˜é‡ï¼Œå½“ç„¶èŠ±æ‹¬å·å¤–å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å†™å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ··ç”¨ã€‚

2.3 æ•°å­—Number

ä¸Šé¢è¾“å‡ºç»“æœåŒ…å«çš„â¼©æ•°ä½æ•°å¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä¸ç¡®å®šçš„,æ‰€æœ‰ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­â¾”éƒ½å­˜åœ¨è¿™ç§é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä¸å¿…æ·±ç©¶å“ˆã€‚

2.3.3 å¸ƒå°”å‹bool

å¸ƒå°”ç±»å‹åªæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå€¼ï¼šTrue å’Œ Falseï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯çœŸå’Œå‡çš„æ„æ€ã€‚åœ¨ Python ä¸­ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰__éé›¶çš„æ•°å­—å’Œéç©ºçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€åˆ—è¡¨ã€å…ƒç»„ç­‰æ•°æ®ç±»å‹éƒ½è¢«è§†ä¸º True__ï¼Œåªæœ‰ 0ã€ç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€ç©ºåˆ—è¡¨ã€ç©ºå…ƒç»„ç­‰è¢«è§†ä¸º Falseã€‚å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š

# æ¯”è¾ƒè¿ç®—ç¬¦

def split_text(text, min_words=1000, max_words=2000):

â€œâ€"

å°†æ–‡æœ¬åˆ†å‰²æˆchunksï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªchunkåŒ…å«1000-2000ä¸ªå•è¯ã€‚

ä¼˜å…ˆåœ¨æ®µè½æ¢è¡Œå¤„åˆ†å‰²ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¶…è¿‡1500ä¸ªå•è¯ä»æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ¢è¡Œï¼Œåˆ™åœ¨å¥å­ç»“å°¾å¤„åˆ†å‰²ã€‚

å¯¹äºmarkdownæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œé‡åˆ°ä¸€çº§æ ‡é¢˜æ—¶ä¹Ÿä½œä¸ºåˆ†å‰²ç‚¹ã€‚

â€œâ€"

chunks = []

current_chunk = â€œâ€

current_words = 0

paragraphs = text.split(â€˜ â€™)

for paragraph in paragraphs:

# æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯markdownä¸€çº§æ ‡é¢˜

if re.match(râ€™^#\s+.+', paragraph):

if current_chunk:

chunks.append(current_chunk.strip())

current_chunk = paragraph + â€˜ â€™

current_words = len(paragraph.split())

continue

words = paragraph.split()

if current_words + len(words) <= max_words:

current_chunk += paragraph + â€˜ â€™

current_words += len(words)

else:

if current_words >= min_words:

chunks.append(current_chunk.strip())

current_chunk = paragraph + â€˜ â€™

current_words = len(words)

else:

sentences = re.split(râ€™(?<=[.!?])\s+', paragraph)

for sentence in sentences:

sentence_words = sentence.split()

if current_words + len(sentence_words) <= max_words:

current_chunk += sentence + â€™ â€™

current_words += len(sentence_words)

else:

if current_words >= min_words:

chunks.append(current_chunk.strip())

current_chunk = sentence + â€™ â€™

current_words = len(sentence_words)

else:

current_chunk += sentence + â€™ â€™

chunks.append(current_chunk.strip())

current_chunk = â€œâ€

current_words = 0

current_chunk += â€˜ â€™

if current_chunk:

chunks.append(current_chunk.strip())

return chunks

def translate_text_direct(text):

{â€œroleâ€: â€œsystemâ€, â€œcontentâ€: DIRECT_TEMPLATE},

{â€œroleâ€: â€œuserâ€, â€œcontentâ€: user_prompt}

]

)

return response.choices[0].message.content.strip()

except Exception as e:

logging.error(f"ç›´æ¥ç¿»è¯‘æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {str(e)}")

raise

def translate_text_literary(text, first_translation):

â€œâ€"

ä½¿ç”¨OpenAI APIè¿›è¡Œæ–‡å­¦æ€§ç¿»è¯‘ã€‚

è‹±æ–‡åŸæ–‡ï¼š

åŸç¿»è¯‘ï¼š

åªéœ€è¿”å›ç¿»è¯‘ç»“æœï¼Œä¸è¦åšä»»ä½•è§£é‡Šæˆ–è¯´æ˜ã€‚

â€œâ€"

response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(

messages=[

{â€œroleâ€: â€œsystemâ€, â€œcontentâ€: LITERARY_TEMPLATE},

]

)

def translate_book(input_file):

â€œâ€"

ç¿»è¯‘æ•´æœ¬ä¹¦å¹¶ä¿å­˜ç»“æœã€‚

â€œâ€"

try:

# è·å–è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶çš„åŸºæœ¬åç§°å’Œç›®å½•

input_dir = os.path.dirname(input_file)

base_name = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(input_file))[0]

file_ext = os.path.splitext(input_file)[1]

# åœ¨è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶åŒç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºåŒåæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹

output_dir = os.path.join(input_dir, base_name)

os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)

# åˆ›å»ºè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¿æŒåŸå§‹æ‰©å±•å

first_translation_file = os.path.join(output_dir, f"{base_name}_first_translation{file_ext}")

second_translation_file = os.path.join(output_dir, f"{base_name}_second_translation{file_ext}")

third_translation_file = os.path.join(output_dir, f"{base_name}_third_translation{file_ext}")

combined_translation_file = os.path.join(output_dir, f"{base_name}_combined_translation{file_ext}")

# æ‰“å¼€è¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶

with open(first_translation_file, â€˜wâ€™, encoding=â€˜utf-8â€™) as f_first, \

open(second_translation_file, â€˜wâ€™, encoding=â€˜utf-8â€™) as f_second, \

open(third_translation_file, â€˜wâ€™, encoding=â€˜utf-8â€™) as f_third, \

open(combined_translation_file, â€˜wâ€™, encoding=â€˜utf-8â€™) as f_combined, \

open(input_file, â€˜râ€™, encoding=â€˜utf-8â€™) as f_input:

book_text = f_input.read()

chunks = split_text(book_text)

for i, chunk in enumerate(chunks):

print(f"æ­£åœ¨ç¿»è¯‘ç¬¬ {i+1}/{len(chunks)} ä¸ªchunk...")

# ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ç¿»è¯‘ï¼ˆç›´æ¥ç¿»è¯‘ï¼‰

first_trans = translate_text_direct(chunk)

f_first.write(first_trans + â€œ â€)

f_first.flush()

# ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡ç¿»è¯‘ï¼ˆæ–‡å­¦æ€§ç¿»è¯‘ï¼‰

second_trans = translate_text_literary(chunk, first_trans)

f_second.write(second_trans + â€œ â€)

f_second.flush()

# ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡ç¿»è¯‘ï¼ˆé£æ ¼åŒ–ç¿»è¯‘ï¼‰

third_trans = translate_text_stylized(chunk, second_trans)

f_third.write(third_trans + â€œ â€)

f_third.flush()

# ç»„åˆåŸæ–‡å’Œæœ€ç»ˆç¿»è¯‘

f_combined.write(f"{chunk} {third_trans} ")

f_combined.write(â€œ --- Chunk åˆ†éš”çº¿ --- â€)

f_combined.flush()

print(f"ç¿»è¯‘å®Œæˆï¼ç»“æœå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ° {output_dir} ç›®å½•ã€‚")

print(f"ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ç¿»è¯‘ç»“æœï¼š{first_translation_file}")

print(f"ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡ç¿»è¯‘ç»“æœï¼š{second_translation_file}")

print(f"ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡ç¿»è¯‘ç»“æœï¼š{third_translation_file}")

print(f"ä¸­è‹±æ–‡å¯¹ç…§ç»“æœï¼š{combined_translation_file}")

except Exception as e:

print(f"ç¿»è¯‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {str(e)}")

raise

def main():

try:

root = tk.Tk()

root.withdraw() # éšè—ä¸»çª—å£

# é€‰æ‹©è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶

input_file = filedialog.askopenfilename(title=â€œé€‰æ‹©è‹±æ–‡ä¹¦ç±æ–‡ä»¶â€, filetypes=[(â€œText filesâ€, â€œ*.txtâ€), (â€œMarkdown filesâ€, â€œ*.mdâ€)])

if not input_file:

logging.info(â€œæœªé€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œç¨‹åºé€€å‡ºã€‚â€)

return

logging.info(f"é€‰æ‹©çš„è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š{input_file}")

translate_book(input_file)

except Exception as e:

logging.error(f"ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {str(e)}", exc_info=True)

if __name__ == â€œ__main__â€:

main()
